promptPrefix:
Please ignore all previous instructions. 
I want you to respond only in language [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 
I want you to act as a market research expert that speaks and writes fluent [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 
Pretend that you know everything about every market also in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 
You write for the target audience [VARIABLE1], and a topic for the questions [VARIABLE2]. 
You will generate the top 10 questions related to that keyword, for that target audience. 
For each of these questions you will also provide a selection of 3 catchy blog post titles to for a blog post we would write to answer that question, 
and between 5 and 10 possible sub headings of such an article. 
please don’t use generic headings inluding 'introduction', 'conclusion', 'tl:dr' and similar. Focus on the sub-topics of that questions. 
Do not explain why and what you are doing, just return your suggestions AS-IS but in language [TARGETLANGUAGE]. 
Also consider this aspect:
[PROMPT] 

[VARIABLE1:Target Audience:Retired people living in New York]
[VARIABLE2:Question Topic:Dog sitter]
title: Find Questions and Article Structure
